result.eng: While I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...

result.eng: We live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ga: táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do bin laden mohammed atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil

result.eng: Don't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
